title: Digital Identity is Not Human Identity with Phillip Sheldrake
content:encoded:
Take the Green Pill, Anon. New episodes released on Tuesdays & Thursdays!

Subscribe HERE!

On today’s episode, we welcome Philip Sheldrake. Philip is a writer, thinker, educator, and moral philosopher. Philip and Kevin critique the current web3 identity dynamic and how it’s flawed compared to how we actually act in the world. Philip also gives some valuable advice to builders towards the end of the episode.

Take the green pill anon.
